mapper.select: select a.idx, a.surveyIdx, a.note, a.corder, a.qtype, a.regdate, a.responseNote, b.responseNote, count(*) as itemCount from am_survey_items as a join am_survey_answer as b on a.idx = b.itemsIdx where a.surveyIdx = #{surveyIdx} order by a.corder asc
mapper.insert: insert into am_survey_answer (surveyIdx, itemsIdx, userIdx, responseNote, regdate) values (#{surveyIdx},#{itemsIdx},#{userIdx},#{responseNote},#{regdate})
mapper.select: select * from am_survey_info as a where now() between a.startdate and a.enddate order by regdate desc
select * from am_survey_info where userIdx = #{userIdx} order by regdate desc
select * from am_survey_items where surveyIdx = #{surveyIdx} order by corder asc
mapper.delete: delete from am_survey_items where surveyIdx = #{surveyIdx} and regdate != #{regdate}
mapper.insert: insert into am_survey_items (surveyIdx, note, corder, responseNote, qtype, regdate) values (#{surveyIdx}, #{note}, #{corder}, #{responseNote}, #{qtype}, #{regdate})
mapper.select: select idx, title, note, regdate, startdate, enddate, userIdx, name, coverImg, (select count(*) from am_survey_items where surveyidx = am_survey_info.idx) as itemCount from am_survey_info where idx = #{idx}
select idx from am_survey_info where title = #{title} order by idx desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into am_survey_info (title, note, regdate, startdate, enddate, userIdx, name, coverImg) values (#{title}, #{note}, now(), #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{userIdx}, #{name}, #{coverImg})

insert into am_user_info (id, password, name, email, phonenm, recruitDate, signDate, station, atype, atype2) values (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phonenm}, #{recruitDate}, now(), #{station}, #{atype}, #{atype2})
mapper.update: update am_user_info set name = #{name}, email = #{email}, phonenm = #{phonenm}, recruitDate = #{recruitDate}, station = #{station}, atype = #{atype}, atype2 = #{atype2} where idx = #{idx}
